title: Easy chicken Marsala
ingredients: ['4 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets', '4 spring onions, chopped', '50g (2 oz) fresh mushrooms, sliced', '75ml (3 fl oz) Marsala wine', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '75ml (3 fl oz) double cream', '2 tablespoons semi-skimmed milk']
